mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bug_version_id AS "bugVersion.id", bugVersion.version as "bugVersion.version", bugVersion.build as "bugVersion.build", a.bug_project_id AS "bugProject.id", bugProject.name as "bugProject.name", a.bug_type AS "bugType", a.bug_status AS "bugStatus", a.bug_level AS "bugLevel", a.name AS "name", a.summary AS "summary", a.description AS "description", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.file AS "file", a.image AS "image", a.testerleadtext AS "testerLeadText", a.developerleadtext AS "developerLeadText", a.projectmanagertext AS "projectManagerText", a.proc_ins_id

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bug( id, bug_version_id, bug_project_id, bug_type, bug_status, bug_level, name, summary, description, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, file, image, testerLeadText, developerleadtext, projectManagerText ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{bugVersion.id}, #{bugProject.id}, #{bugType}, #{bugStatus}, #{bugLevel}, #{name}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{file}, #{image}, #{testerLeadText}, #{developerLeadText}, #{projectManagerText} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bug SET bug_version_id = #{bugVersion.id}, bug_project_id = #{bugProject.id}, bug_type = #{bugType}, bug_status = #{bugStatus}, bug_level = #{bugLevel}, name = #{name}, summary = #{summary}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, file = #{file}, image = #{image}, testerLeadText = #{testerLeadText}, developerleadtext = #{developerLeadText}, projectManagerText = #{projectManagerText} WHERE id = #{id}
